content:
{"name": "Farmers Market Nutrition Program (WIC)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! https://northcarolina.summerebtapp.com/begin
Apply by mail. Fill out a paper application and mail it to your local county DSS office. Form link  https://policies.ncdhhs.gov/divisional/social-services/forms/dss-8207-application-for-food-and-nutrition-services/@@display-file/form_file/dss-8207-ia.pdf
Apply online with https://epass.nc.gov/CitizenPortal/application.do. You may need to create an account first
Apply in person at your https://www.ncdhhs.gov/divisions/social-services/local-dss-directory) office

", "email": "", "url": "https://www.ncdhhs.gov/divisions/child-and-family-well-being/food-and-nutrition-services-food-stamps/apply-food-and-nutrition-services-food-stamps", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "5601 Six Forks Road", "address_2": null, "city": "North Raleigh", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "27609", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.8581883, "longitude": -78.640658}, "phones": [{"number": "(919) 707-5800", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Assists clients with SNAP applications, Social Security, Medicaid and Medicare, and other safety net benefits from the city, state, and federal government"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Social security cards or Birth certificates for every member of the household"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
